languages.text: "Как можно, шерин. Неужели я пала столь низко, что кто-то допускает, будто Джай Хейдари способна на обман?" {n}Джай подносит руку к груди в трагическом жесте под одобрительный гогот окружающих.{/n}

"How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Как можно, шерин. Неужели я пала столь низко, что кто-то допускает, будто Джай Хейдари способна на обман?" {n}Джай подносит руку к груди в трагическом жесте под одобрительный гогот окружающих.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

"How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

"How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

languages.text: “你怎么能说这种话呢，亲爱的？难道婕伊·海达利真的堕落到了这种程度，大家都以为她是个会说谎骗人的人吗？”{n}婕伊将手放在胸口上，比了个伤心的手势，她的伙伴们哄堂大笑起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你怎么能说这种话呢，亲爱的？难道婕伊·海达利真的堕落到了这种程度，大家都以为她是个会说谎骗人的人吗？”{n}婕伊将手放在胸口上，比了个伤心的手势，她的伙伴们哄堂大笑起来。{/n}

languages.text: 「よくもそんなことを言えたもんだね、シャリーン？ジェイ・ヘイダリが、本当に誰かに騙されるほどに落ちぶれたと思ってるの？」{n}仲間たちの笑いを浴びながら、ジェイは胸に手を当てて悲痛なジェスチャーをした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「よくもそんなことを言えたもんだね、シャリーン？ジェイ・ヘイダリが、本当に誰かに騙されるほどに落ちぶれたと思ってるの？」{n}仲間たちの笑いを浴びながら、ジェイは胸に手を当てて悲痛なジェスチャーをした。{/n}

languages.text: «¿Cómo puede sugerir siquiera algo así, shereen? ¿Tan bajo ha caído Jae Heydari como para que se le acuse de engaño?». {n}Jae, dramática, se lleva la mano al pecho entre las risotadas de sus socios.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo puede sugerir siquiera algo así, shereen? ¿Tan bajo ha caído Jae Heydari como para que se le acuse de engaño?». {n}Jae, dramática, se lleva la mano al pecho entre las risotadas de sus socios.{/n}

languages.text: « Comment osez-vous suggérer une chose pareille, shereen ? Jae Heydari est-elle tombée si bas que l'on pourrait la croire capable de duperie ? » {n}Jae porte une main à sa poitrine de façon exagérée, sous les rires approbateurs de son entourage.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Comment osez-vous suggérer une chose pareille, shereen ? Jae Heydari est-elle tombée si bas que l'on pourrait la croire capable de duperie ? » {n}Jae porte une main à sa poitrine de façon exagérée, sous les rires approbateurs de son entourage.{/n}

languages.text: "Wie könnt Ihr so etwas nur sagen, Shereen? Ist Jae Heydari wirklich so tief gefallen, dass man jetzt schon glaubt, ich würde betrügen?" {n}Mit tragischer Geste fasst sich Jae an die Brust, was von ihren Partnern mit zustimmendem Gelächter quittiert wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wie könnt Ihr so etwas nur sagen, Shereen? Ist Jae Heydari wirklich so tief gefallen, dass man jetzt schon glaubt, ich würde betrügen?" {n}Mit tragischer Geste fasst sich Jae an die Brust, was von ihren Partnern mit zustimmendem Gelächter quittiert wird.{/n}

languages.text: "Böyle bir şeyi nasıl ileri sürebilirsin şirinim? Jae Heydari, insanların onun aldatmacaya başvuracağını düşünmesini sağlayacak kadar mı alçaldı?" {n}Jae'ın trajik bir edayla elini göğsüne götürmesi üzerine iş arkadaşları, kahkahalara boğuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "How could you even suggest such a thing, shereen? Has Jae Heydari really fallen so low that someone could think me capable of deceit?" {n}Jae brings her hand to her chest in a tragic gesture, to the approving guffaws of her associates.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Böyle bir şeyi nasıl ileri sürebilirsin şirinim? Jae Heydari, insanların onun aldatmacaya başvuracağını düşünmesini sağlayacak kadar mı alçaldı?" {n}Jae iş arkadaşlarının kahkahaları arasında, trajik bir edayla elini göğsüne götürüyor.{/n}
